content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at position (0, 0). However, it is currently showing a status of "NO_FUEL" and "no ingredients to smelt." 

# To begin smelting iron ore into iron plates, I need to add coal as fuel and iron ore as the ingredient. 

# I will insert coal into the furnace as fuel and iron ore as the ingredient for smelting.

insert_into(furnace, item='coal', quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 units of coal into the furnace.
insert_into(furnace, item='iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 units of iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after insertion.
